## Hints.ConfidenceLevel type

Confidence level for a generated hint, ranging from 1 (low) to 5 (high).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ConfidenceLevel = Brand<1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5, 'ConfidenceLevel'>;
```
